name: PEM_XS_BAT_PERF_STAT_RAW_EVENT_26
summary: Verify in system-wide all CPU PEM perf to check any performance event excursion occurs due to base_freq drop for the raw event ID \"26\" during 60 seconds CPU stress, event ID 26 stands for PROCHOT, perf command: perf stat -e pnp_excursion_monitor/event=26,frequency_threshold=$base_freq_mhz,duration=10/ sleep 60
